mapper.insert: insert into user(email, password, user_name, interest, logintype, user_no) values(#{email}, #{password}, #{user_name}, #{interest}, #{logintype}, #{user_no})
mapper.select: select * from user where email=#{email} and password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into user_upload (filename, filepath, uuid, user_no) values( #{filename}, #{filepath}, #{uuid}, #{user_no})
